statements: DELETE FROM restoration_progress WHERE milestone = 'Final Inspection';
DELETE FROM restoration_progress WHERE restoration_id = 10 AND progress_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM restoration_progress WHERE milestone LIKE '%completed%' AND photo_path IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM restoration_photos WHERE log_id = 1 AND photo_url LIKE '%old%'
DELETE FROM milestones WHERE milestone_id = 100 AND milestone_name = 'Final Touch';
DELETE FROM restoration_dates WHERE description = 'Restored on time';
DELETE FROM restoration_photos WHERE restoration_id = 3 AND photo_id = 5;
